contexts.context: ..., sicuti bene facis, colas et observes et <mark>sorores</mark> ames, prout ab eodem commendatore latius intelliges,...
...prẹteritis futura colligentes non possumus non pronuntiare has nostras <mark>sorores</mark> esse male fortunatas, ubi in has nuptias inciderint...
...Die eigenhändige Unterfertigung lautet: E. S. V. obediens <mark>soror</mark> Maria etc. Rückwärts Adresse: Ser mo principi...
